thread.title: Bastian Schweinsteiger: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho adds maligned midfielder to his Europa League squad
thread.title_full: Bastian Schweinsteiger: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho adds maligned midfielder to his Europa League squad

author: achapman
title: Bastian Schweinsteiger: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho adds maligned midfielder to his Europa League squad
text:
Bast's the Way Bastian Schweinsteiger: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho adds maligned midfielder to his Europa League squad 
German's Old Trafford career looked to be over at start of the season but he's now worked his way back into Euro plans By ANTHONY CHAPMAN Comments BASTIAN SCHWEINSTEIGER’S Manchester United revival continues after being added to Jose Mourinho’s Europa League squad. 
The German midfielder was left off the initial 25-man group at the start of the season but can now feature for the Red Devils on Thursday nights after impressing his boss with some fine recent performances. Reuters 5 Bastian Schweinsteiger has been added to Man Utd’s Europa League squad 
Schweinsteiger has managed to turn around a dire situation at Old Trafford to become a regular member of the first team once again. Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Mourinho was adamant the veteran would be sold last summer, but no buyers came forward despite Schweinsteiger being dropped to the reserves. 
However, he was handed a reprieve before December’s heavy winter schedule and could now feature in United’s Europa League last-32 clash against French side Saint-Etienne. Getty Images The midfielder is enjoying a mini-revival at Old Trafford after some recent performances Juan Mata misses a sitter as Manchester United fail to beat Hull Getty Images 5 Mourinho was trying to get rid of the German at the start of the season 
Schweinsteiger’s opportunity comes at the expense of Morgan Schneiderlin , who was sold to Everton for £20million during the January transfer window. 
He still has 17 months left on his contract but whether there’s a role for him next season remains to be seen. Related Stories Thinking ahead Jose Mourinho reveals he already knows who he wants to sign in the summer transfer window STARS MUST SHOW MOUR Jose Mourinho says some of his mega-rich Man United players are living in a comfort zone Brand Beckham What is David Beckham's net worth and how much does the former Man United star earn a year? Full Nelson Man Utd agree 'deal in principle' to sign right-back Nelson Semedo from Benfica for £35m next summer Getty Images Schweinsteiger could now be playing on Thursday nights for United Getty Images 5 Reports in Portugal claim United have agreed a £35m deal for Nelson Semedo 
Mourinho claims to have already drawn up his list of summer transfer targets and reports in Portugal claim he’s already landed one of them in the shape of Benfica right-back Nelson Semedo . 
United are said to have agreed a ‘deal in principle’ for the youngster in a deal which is worth an astonishing £35million.
